name: For beginners
description: Total yoga newbie? We have you covered with this workout designed specifically for first-timers.

name: Morning Yoga
description: This morning yoga workout will wake you up by gently raising your heart rate while lengthening and strengthening your body from head to toe. Plus, it's quick enough to squeeze in before the day gets busy.

name: Yoga for stress
shortDescription: Designed to help with stress and anxiety
description: This yoga sequence will help you relax as you connect your breathe to asanas intended to help you cultivate calm.

name: Ease into it
description: If your workout mood is more 'balance' than 'burn,' this flow is for you.
